      • values

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> values(Document document)
        Gets the DACL Member values from the source document. Retreives values ONLY from the item defined by getItemname().
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to retreive the Member values.
        Returns:
        DACL Member values. Null if not present or empty.

      • values

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> values(Document document,
                                         boolean checkAllItems)
        Gets the DACL Member values from the source document. Conditionally retreives values from ALL DACL items or ONLY from the item defined by getItemname().
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to retreive the Member values.
        checkAllItems - Flag indicating if all items should be checked. If false then only the getItemname() will be checked.
        Returns:
        DACL Member values. Null if not present or empty.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Session session,
               java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> dacl,
               java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> roles,
               Name name)
        Determines if the passed in name is a member of the dacl entries. Returns true if the name (in any name format), or any member of roles is a member of the dacl entries.
        Parameters:
        session - Current Session
        dacl - DACL entries to check
        roles - ACL Roles belonging to the name to check. (No verification is performed)
        name - Name to check
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the name (in any form) is a member of the dacl set, or if any intersection exists between dacl and roles.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Session session,
               Document document,
               Name name,
               boolean checkAllItems)
        Determines if the passed in name is a member of the specified DACL for the document. Conditionally checks values from ALL DACL items or ONLY from the item defined by getItemname().
        Parameters:
        session - Current Session
        document - Document to search for DACL
        name - Name to check
        checkAllItems - Flag indicating if all items should be checked. If false then only the getItemname() will be checked.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the name is a member of the specified DACL for the document.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Session session,
               Document document,
               Name name)
        Determines if the passed in name is a member of the specified DACL for the document. Checks values ONLY from the item defined by getItemname().
        Parameters:
        session - Current Session
        document - Document to search for DACL
        name - Name to check
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the name is a member of the specified DACL for the document.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Session session,
               Document document,
               boolean checkAllItems)

        Parameters:
        session - Current Session
        document - Document to search for DACL
        checkAllItems - Flag indicating if all items should be checked. If false then only the getItemname() will be checked.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the name is a member of the specified DACL for the document.

      • set

        public boolean set(Document document,
          java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> members,
          java.lang.String override,
          boolean doNotAddRole)
        Sets the DACL item on the source document. Does NOT save the document. Conditionally overrides the item name. Conditionally adds the Default role getRole()
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to set the DACL item.
        members - Names or roles to be set as the DACL value.
        override - Name of DACL item to be added. Overrides getItemname(). If null or blank then getItemname() will be used.
        doNotAddRole - Flag indicating if the getRole() should be explicitly added. If True, the role will not be added NOTE: if the Role is a member of members it will NOT be excluded, regardless of doNotAddRole
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • set

        public boolean set(Document document,
          java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> members,
          boolean doNotAddRole)
        Sets the DACL item on the source document. Does NOT save the document. Conditionally adds the Default role getRole()
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to set the DACL item.
        members - Names or roles to be set as the DACL value.
        doNotAddRole - Flag indicating if the getRole() should be explicitly added. If True, the role will not be added NOTE: if the Role is a member of members it will NOT be excluded, regardless of doNotAddRole
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • set

        public boolean set(Document document,
          java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> members)
        Sets the DACL item on the source document. Does NOT save the document. Adds the Default role getRole()
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to set the DACL item.
        members - Names or roles to be set as the DACL value.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

        Parameters:

      • add

        public boolean add(Document document,
          java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> members)
        Adds a members to the DACL for the document. Existing DACL members are not removed. Adds the Default role getRole(). Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to update the .
        members - Names or roles to be added to the DACL value.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • add

        public boolean add(Document document,
          java.lang.Object values)
        Adds a members to the DACL for the document. Existing DACL members are not removed. Adds the Default role getRole(). Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to update the .
        values - Names or roles (String or object convertable to a TreeSet of Strings) to be added.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • addRole

        public boolean addRole(Document document,
              java.lang.String string)
        Adds a Role to the appropriate DACL item on a document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document to which the Role shall be added.
        string - Role to be added to the document.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the Role was added to the item.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Document document,
             boolean removeAll)
        Removes the DACL item from the source document. Conditionally removes ALL DACL items or ONLY the item defined by getItemname(). Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to remove the DACL item(s).
        removeAll - Flag indicating if ALL DACL items found on the document should be removed.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the item was successfully removed.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Document document)
        Removes the DACL item from the source document. Removed ONLY the item defined by getItemname(). Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to remove the DACL item(s).
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the item was successfully removed.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Document document,
             java.lang.String member)
        Removes an explicit to the DACL for the document. Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to update the .
        member - Names or roles to be removed from the DACL value.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Document document,
             java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> members)
        Removes members to the DACL for the document. Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:

        members - Names or roles to be removed from the DACL value.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • removeRole

        public boolean removeRole(Document document,
                 java.lang.String string)
        Removes a Role from the appropriate DACL on a document. NOTE: This will NOT remove the DEFAULT_DACL_READERS or DEFAULT_DACL_AUTHORS roles.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which the Role shall be removed.
        string - Role to be removed from the document.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the Role was removed from the item.

      • replaceRole

        public boolean replaceRole(Document document,
                  java.lang.String oldrole,
                  java.lang.String newrole)
        Replaces a Role on the appropriate DACL on a document. NOTE: This will NOT remove the DEFAULT_DACL_READERS or DEFAULT_DACL_AUTHORS roles.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which the Role shall be removed.
        oldrole - Role to be removed from the document.
        newrole - Role to be added from the document.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the Role was replaced on the item.

      • getPatternForRoles

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern getPatternForRoles()
        Gets the Pattern that a string must match in order to be considered as an ACL Role.
        Returns:
        Pattern for a role

      • values

        public static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> values(Document document,
                                         DACL daclType,
                                         boolean checkAllItems)
        Gets the DACL Member values from the source document. Returns the values of all AUTHOR or READER fields found on the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to retreive the DACL Member values.
        daclType - DACL (AUTHOR or READER) for which to search. If null then returns a combination of all AUTHOR and READER types.
        checkAllItems - Flag indicating if all items should be checked. If false then only the getItemname() will be checked.
        Returns:
        DACL Member values. Null if not present or empty.

      • set

        public static boolean set(Document document,
          java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> values,
          java.lang.String itemname,
          DACL daclType,
          boolean doNotAddRole)
        Sets the DACL item on the source document. Does NOT save the document. Conditionally overrides the item name. Conditionally adds the Default role getRole()
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to set the DACL_AUTHORS item.
        values - Names or roles to be set as the DACL_AUTHORS value. If null or empty AND doNotAddRole is true, then the item will be REMOVED from the document.
        itemname - Name of DACL item to be added.
        daclType - DACL of item to be added.
        doNotAddRole - Flag indicating if the getRole() should be explicitly added. If True, the role will not be added NOTE: if the Role is a member of values it will NOT be excluded, regardless of doNotAddRole
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • remove

        public static boolean remove(Document document,
             DACL daclType,
             boolean removeAll)
        Removes the DACL item from the source document. Conditionally removes ALL DACL items or ONLY the item defined by getItemname(). Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to remove the DACL item(s).
        daclType - DACL (AUTHOR or READER) for which to search. If null then removes both AUTHOR and READER types.
        removeAll - Flag indicating if ALL DACL items found on the document should be removed.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the item was successfully removed.

      • removeRoles

        public static java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> removeRoles(java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> source,
                                              Database database)
        Removes all ACL Roles from a set of strings. Removes all bracketed (beginning with "[" and ending with "]") entries from an input set. Optionally comares all entries to all roles from the passed in database and removes any matching entries.
        Parameters:
        source - Set of strings to process
        database - Optional database from which to check ACL roles
        Returns:
        source with all roles removed.

      • containsRole

        public static boolean containsRole(java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.String> roles,
                   java.lang.String role)
        Determines if a specified role is contained within a set of roles. Performs a case-insensitive comparison of all entries to check for match. Strips any leading "[" or trailing "]" characters prior to comparison.
        Parameters:
        roles - Roles to check for match
        role - Role to check for existence in Roles
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the specified Role is contained in the set of Roles.

      • setAuthors

        public static boolean setAuthors(Document document,
                 java.lang.Object values)
        Sets the DACL_AUTHORS item on the source document. The value for DEFAULT_DACL_AUTHORS is included. Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to set the DACL_AUTHORS item.
        values - Names or roles (convertable to a TreeSet) to be set as the DACL_AUTHORS value.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • addAuthors

        public static boolean addAuthors(Document document,
                 java.lang.Object values)
        Adds a value to the DACL_AUTHORS for the document. Existing DACL_AUTHORS are not removed. The value for DEFAULT_DACL_AUTHORS is included. Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document upon which to update the DACL_AUTHORS.
        values - Names or roles (String or object convertable to a TreeSet of Strings) to be added.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating the success / failure of the operation.

      • removeAuthors

        public static boolean removeAuthors(Document document)
        Removes the DACL_AUTHORS item from the source document. Does NOT save the document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document from which to remove the DACL_AUTHORS item.
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the item was successfully removed.
